title: Korean fried tofu with spicy dipping sauce
ingredients: ['400g firm tofu', 'pinch of sea salt, or to taste', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '240ml vegetable oil for frying, or as needed', 'Dipping Sauce', '80ml soy sauce', '2 spring onions, sliced', '2 chilli peppers, thinly sliced', '2 teaspoons white vinegar', '2 teaspoons sugar', '1 teaspoon dried chilli flakes']
